item.title: Ozy Media 创始人卡洛斯-沃森因诈骗罪被判处近 10 年徒刑
item.description: Ozy Media 创始人卡洛斯-沃森（Carlos Watson）于本周一被判处近 10 年监禁，陪审团于今年 7 月认定他在这家现已倒闭的初创公司的财务以及与谷歌和奥普拉-温弗瑞（Oprah Winfrey）的虚假交易方面向投资者撒谎的罪名成立。【原文：Ozy Media founder Carlos Watson was sentenced on Monday to nearly 10 years in prison, after a jury found him guilty in July of lying to investors about the now-defunct startup's finances and sham deals with Google and Oprah Winfrey.】

item.title: 解释器：美国比特币战略储备如何运作？
item.description: 在当选总统唐纳德-特朗普重申建立美国比特币战略储备的计划后，比特币周一创下了107,000美元以上的历史新高，激起了加密货币多头的热情。以下是该计划的运作方式。【原文：Bitcoin hit a record high above $107,000 on Monday after President-elect Donald Trump reiterated plans to create a U.S. bitcoin strategic reserve, stoking the enthusiasm of crypto bulls. Here's how the plan could work.】

item.title: 早间竞标央行庆典前的政治不安涟漪
item.description: 亚洲市场前瞻【原文：A look at the day ahead in Asian markets.】

item.title: SEC 称，Becton Dickinson 就输液泵风险指控达成和解
item.description: 美国证券交易委员会（U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission）周一表示，已就有关 Becton Dickinson and Co. (BD) 在 Alaris 输液泵相关风险方面误导投资者的指控与该公司达成和解。【原文：The U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission said on Monday that it had settled charges with Becton Dickinson and Co. (BD) over allegations it misled investors about risks associated with its Alaris infusion pump.】

item.title: 独家消息消息人士称巴西投资者 Tanure 正与卡西诺就 GPA 股份进行初步谈判
item.description: 据一位熟知内情的消息人士透露，巴西投资者纳尔逊-塔努雷（Nelson Tanure）已开始与法国零售商 Casino 初步商谈购买其在超市运营商 GPA , 的至少部分股份，这可能会增加与塔努雷结盟的基金近日积累的股份。【原文：Brazilian investor Nelson Tanure has initiated preliminary discussions with French retailer Casino ,about buying at least part of its shares in supermarket operator GPA ,, according to a source familiar with the matter, potentially adding to a stake amassed by funds allied to Tanure in recent days.】

item.title: 特朗普称 "我们要打掉中间商 "后，保险公司股票下跌
item.description: 美国当选总统唐纳德-特朗普称经营药房福利管理公司的医疗保险公司是推高成本的中间商，并表示他计划取消这些公司的作用，此后这些公司的股价周一下跌。【原文：Shares of health insurers operating pharmacy benefit managers fell on Monday after U.S. President-elect Donald Trump called them middlemen who drive up costs and said he plans to eliminate their role.】

item.title: TikTok 诉诸美国最高法院，为避免禁令做最后努力
item.description: TikTok 周一为继续在美国运营做出了最后的努力，请求最高法院暂时阻止一项法律，该法律旨在迫使其中国母公司字节跳动在 1 月 19 日前剥离这款短视频应用，否则将面临禁令。【原文：TikTok made a last-ditch effort on Monday to continue operating in the United States, asking the Supreme Court to temporarily block a law intended to force ByteDance, its China-based parent company, to divest the short-video app by Jan. 19 or face a ban.】

item.title: 美国法官下令重开 Citgo 数据室，重新启动竞标
item.description: 一份法庭文件显示，一名负责监督委内瑞拉所有的 Citgo 石油公司母公司股份拍卖的美国法官周一同意重新开放数据室，允许潜在买家准备新的出价。【原文：A U.S. judge overseeing an auction of shares in the parent of Venezuela-owned Citgo Petroleum on Monday agreed to reopen a data room to allow potential buyers to prepare new bids, a court document showed.】

item.title: 美国将于 2027 年要求汽车安装后排安全带提醒装置
item.description: 美国交通部周一表示，将从 2027 年底开始要求后座提醒系统提高安全带的使用率，以减少近年来不断上升的交通事故死伤人数。【原文：The U.S. Transportation Department said Monday it will require rear seat reminder systems to boost seat belt use starting in late 2027 in a bid to reduce traffic crash deaths and injuries that have been rising in recent years.】

item.title: 美国债券投资者为 "鹰派减息 "做好准备，唾弃长期债券
item.description: 债券投资者预计美联储将在周三将利率下调四分之一个百分点，他们担心央行将在2025年缩减宽松政策，因为预计特朗普政府将提高通胀率。【原文：Bond investors, expecting the Federal Reserve to cut interest rates by a quarter of a percentage point on Wednesday, are bracing for the central bank to scale back its easing in 2025 in anticipation of higher inflation under the Trump administration.】

item.title: Meta 为雷朋智能眼镜增加实时翻译和人工智能视频功能
item.description: Meta Platforms 公司周一表示，它已经更新了雷朋 Meta 智能眼镜，使其具备了人工智能视频功能和实时语言翻译功能。【原文：Meta Platforms said on Monday it has updated the Ray-Ban Meta smart glasses with AI video capability and real-time language translation functionality.】

item.title: 如果沃尔玛不遵守裁决，墨西哥反垄断机构可能对其处以更多罚款
item.description: 墨西哥反垄断监管机构 Cofece 周一表示，如果沃尔玛的本地子公司 Walmex 不遵守禁止该零售商从事某些被视为非法行为的决议，该机构可能会对其处以最高达收入 8%的罚款。【原文：Mexico's antitrust watchdog Cofece said it could fine Walmart's local unit Walmex up to 8% of its income if it does not comply with a resolution prohibiting the retailer from engaging in certain conduct deemed illegal, the regulator said on Monday.】

item.title: 独家报道：消息人士：阿萨德下台后，叙利亚保留了 26 吨黄金储备
item.description: 四位熟悉情况的人士告诉路透社记者，叙利亚中央银行的金库里有近 26 吨黄金，与 2011 年血腥内战开始时的数量相同，即使在巴沙尔-阿萨德的专制政权混乱倒台之后也是如此。【原文：The vault of Syria's central bank holds nearly 26 tons of gold, the same amount it had at the start of its bloody civil war in 2011, even after the chaotic fall of Bashar al-Assad's despotic regime, four people familiar with the situation told Reuters.】

item.title: 美国制造商预测在经历长期低迷后 2025 年将实现增长
item.description: 美国制造商对明年该行业将摆脱长期衰退持乐观态度，尽管资本支出的增长可能低于 2024 年的速度。【原文：U.S. manufacturers are optimistic that the sector will emerge from a prolonged recession next year, though capital expenditure growth was likely to fall short of 2024's pace.】

item.title: 独家报道消息人士称申银万国考虑在伦敦首次公开募股中出售不到 10%的公司股份
item.description: 据两位知情人士透露，快速时尚零售商Shein正在考虑要求英国监管机构放弃上市规则，即在计划的伦敦上市中至少有10%的股份必须向公众出售。【原文：Fast fashion retailer Shein is considering asking UK regulators to waive listing rules that require at least 10% of its shares to be sold to the public in its planned London flotation, two people with knowledge of the matter said.】

item.title: 洛克希德公司成立子公司帮助国防公司采用人工智能
item.description: 洛克希德-马丁公司（Lockheed Martin）周一表示，该公司已成立了一家子公司，将帮助美国国防公司把人工智能纳入其运营中。【原文：Lockheed Martin said on Monday it had formed a subsidiary that will help U.S. defense companies incorporate artificial intelligence into their operations.】

item.title: 独家报道：十个欧盟国家寻求对原产于俄罗斯的金属实施更广泛的制裁--信
item.description: 路透社看到的一封信显示，十个欧盟（EU）国家提议对俄罗斯的贸易（包括铝等金属的产出）实施进一步制裁，以进一步削减该国的收入和乌克兰战争的资金。【原文：Ten European Union (EU) countries have proposed further sanctions on Russian trade, including its output of metals such as aluminium, to further cut the country's revenues and funding for its war in Ukraine, a letter seen by Reuters showed.】

item.title: 美国要求对外国航空维修站进行药物和酒精测试
item.description: 美国联邦航空管理局（Federal Aviation Administration）周一表示，它已最终确定了要求外国航空维修站对为美国航空公司执行安全敏感维修职能的员工进行药物和酒精测试的规定。【原文：The Federal Aviation Administration said Monday it has finalized rules requiring aviation-repair stations in foreign countries to conduct drug and alcohol testing for employees performing safety-sensitive maintenance functions for U.S. airlines.】

item.title: 关税阴影笼罩，美国 12 月工厂活动进一步下滑
item.description: 由于担心提高关税会抬高明年进口原材料的价格，12 月份美国制造业活动进一步萎缩，衡量工厂产出的指标降至逾四年半以来的最低水平。【原文：U.S. manufacturing activity contracted further in December, with a measure of factory output dropping to the lowest level in more than 4-1/2 years amid worries that higher tariffs would raise prices of imported raw materials next year.】

item.title: 地区性贷款机构伯克希尔山庄银行与布鲁克林银行达成 11 亿美元合并协议
item.description: 伯克希尔山庄银行公司（Berkshire Hills Bancorp）和布鲁克林银行公司（Brookline Bancorp）周一表示，两家地区性贷款机构已同意进行全股票合并，交易价值约为 11 亿美元。【原文：Berkshire Hills Bancorp and Brookline Bancorp have agreed to merge in an all-stock deal valued at about $1.1 billion, the regional lenders said on Monday, in yet another sign of increasing consolidation within the industry.】

item.title: 美国敲定为福特和 SK On 合资电池企业提供 96.3 亿美元贷款
item.description: 美国能源部周一表示，已敲定向福特汽车公司和韩国电池制造商 SK On 的合资企业提供 96.3 亿美元的贷款，用于资助在田纳西州和肯塔基州新建三座电池生产厂。【原文：The U.S. Energy Department on Monday said it has finalized a $9.63 billion loan to a joint venture of Ford Motor and South Korean battery maker SK On to help finance construction of three new battery manufacturing plants in Tennessee and Kentucky.】

item.title: Arm-Qualcomm 芯片合同纠纷审判即将开始
item.description: Arm 公司与高通公司之间的一场官司将于周一在特拉华州的一个法庭开庭审理，这场官司可能会扰乱人工智能 PC 的发展浪潮。【原文：The trial in a legal battle between Arm and Qualcomm that could disrupt a wave of artificial intelligence PCs is set to begin on Monday in a Delaware courtroom.】

item.title: 当人工智能与泰勒-斯威夫特（Taylor Swift）并驾齐驱，成为城中的热门话题时
item.description: 在这个空旷的会议中心深处，在充满数学气息的海报上或在热烈的交谈中，人工智能可能正在取得突破性进展。【原文：Deep in the cavernous convention center here, on math-filled posters or in spirited conversations, could be a breakthrough for artificial intelligence in the making.】

item.title: 国际和国内保险公司进军受灾害影响的美国房地产市场
item.description: 在一些美国公司退出后，国际和国内保险公司正大举进军美国市场，为难以得到保障的住宅收取高额保费，并获得丰厚利润。【原文：International and domestic insurers are pushing into the U.S. market for hard-to-protect homes, charging high premiums and enjoying strong profits after some U.S. firms pulled out.】

item.title: 据 CNBC 报道，软银首席执行官将在访问特朗普期间宣布在美投资 1,000 亿美元
item.description: 据美国有线电视新闻网（CNBC）周一报道，软银集团首席执行官孙正义将在周一访问美国当选总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的官邸马阿拉歌（Mar-a-Lago）时宣布，未来四年将在美国投资1000亿美元。【原文：SoftBank Group CEO Masayoshi Son will announce a $100 billion investment in the U.S. over the next four years during a Monday visit to U.S. President-elect Donald Trump's residence Mar-a-Lago, CNBC reported on Monday.】

item.title: 交易员为美联储和数据密集的一周做好准备，期货走高
item.description: 美国股指期货周一上涨，因为投资者期待本周晚些时候美联储的降息预期，以及有助于为明年政策定调的关键数据。【原文：U.S. stock index futures gained ground on Monday, as investors looked ahead to an anticipated Federal Reserve interest rate cut later in the week, as well as key data prints that will help set the tone for policy next year.】

item.title: 兰博基尼首席执行官表示，由于市场尚未准备就绪，首款电动车将推迟至 2029 年推出
item.description: 意大利兰博基尼首席执行官斯蒂芬-温克尔曼（Stephan Winkelmann）周一表示，由于跑车市场全面电气化的时机尚未成熟，兰博基尼计划在2029年推出首款电动车型。【原文：Italy's Lamborghini plans to launch its first electric model in 2029 as time is not ripe for full electrification in the sports car market segment, CEO Stephan Winkelmann said on Monday.】

item.title: 霍尼韦尔考虑分拆航空航天业务
item.description: 霍尼韦尔国际公司（Honeywell International）周一表示，董事会将继续审查其业务组合，包括航空航天业务分拆的可能性，这使得该企业集团的股价在盘前交易中上涨了近 3%。【原文：Honeywell International said on Monday its board continues to review its business portfolio, including a potential separation of the aerospace business, sending the conglomerate's shares up nearly 3% in premarket trading.】

item.title: 美联储看到了美国近期生产力增长可能持续的曙光
item.description: Dreanda Cordero 在养育三个孩子五年后，今年重新进入就业市场，找到了一个她并不满意的数据录入职位，这个职位要求现场工作，她很难兼顾，而且恰逢她自己和一个孩子的健康出现问题。【原文：Dreanda Cordero reentered the job market this year after a five-year break to raise three children, landing a data entry position she was not thrilled about that required on-site work she had trouble juggling and coincided with health troubles of her own and one of her kids.】

item.title: 独家报道投资者称宝洁公司将披露更多木浆审计细节
item.description: 投资者告诉路透社记者，宝洁公司已向一群股东承诺，将披露更多有关如何审核木浆供应商的细节，此前股东们已多年推动夏敏（Charmin）卫生纸生产商以更可持续的方式采购林产品。【原文：Procter & Gamble has promised a group of shareholders it will disclose more details about how it audits wood-pulp suppliers, the investors told Reuters, after shareholders pushed the maker of Charmin toilet paper for years to source forest products more sustainably.】
